程序包 Jest

类 GameTable

java.lang.Object
Jest.Observable
Jest.GameTable
所有已实现的接口:
java.lang.Runnable, Accepter
public class GameTable
extends Observable
implements Accepter, java.lang.Runnable
The class GameTable represents the game table which contains all the cards, all the players and all the operations of the game system. There is the main function in this class. Because of concurrent programming, it should be a thread which enables the player to play the game from command line. Therefore, it implements the class Runnable.

  • 字段详细资料

    • Trophy

      public java.util.LinkedList<Card> Trophy
      Trophy is a linked list of cards which formed the trophy. Trophy is the card which will be added to the jest of the players whose Jest meets the condition in the orange band of each Trophy.

    • playerlist

      public java.util.LinkedList<Player> playerlist
      playerlist is a linked list of players who play the game (human players and virtual players)

    • humanPlayers

      public java.util.LinkedList<HumanPlayer> humanPlayers
      playerlist is a linked list of human players who play the game.

    • virtualPlayers

      public java.util.LinkedList<VirtualPlayer> virtualPlayers
      playerlist is a linked list of virtual players who play the game.

    • cardnumber

      public int cardnumber

    • InterfaceOffer

      public InterfaceOffer InterfaceOffer

    • interfaceOffer2

      public InterfaceOffer interfaceOffer2

    • playerdecided

      public Player playerdecided
      playerdicided is the player who is going to take the offer.

  • 方法详细资料

    • getinstance

      public static GameTable getinstance()
      Because of the use of the design pattern Singleton, getinstance() returns the unique instance of the class GameTable. If the instance is not defined, we create a new one and send it to the unique instance which we have declared as attribut.
      返回:
      type of GameTable which is the unique instance of the class.

    • addplayer

      public void addplayer​(Player player)
      addplayer(Player player) enables to add a new player to the playerlist.
      参数:
      player - is the player which will be added to the playerlist.

    • hascard

      public boolean hascard()
      hascard() can check if there are still cards in the drawdeck.
      返回:
      type of boolean (true = yes, false = no).

    • enoughplayer

      public boolean enoughplayer()
      enoughplayer() can check if there are enough players for the game. We here only accept from 1 player to 4 players.
      返回:
      type of boolean (true = yes, false = no).

    • setup

      public void setup()
      setup() can set up the game table to start the game. If there are 3 players there will be 2 trophy. If there are 4 players there will be 1 trophy. Here shuffle the drawdeck and choose the certain number of them randomly as trophy.

    • distribute

      public void distribute()
      distribute() adds to the stack a number of cards from the draw deck equal to the number of players.

    • dealcards

      public void dealcards()
      dealcards() deals each player 2 cards face-down from the drew deck.

    • fullofferPlayers

      public java.util.LinkedList<Player> fullofferPlayers()
      fullofferPlayers() checks the player in the player list one by one if their offers have been taken of not.
      返回:
      a linked list of players whose offers have not been taken.

    • decideOrder

      public Player decideOrder()
      decideOrder() decides the which player will be the next to take offer.
      返回:
      type of class Player which is the player who will be the next to take offer.

    • recycle

      public void recycle()
      At the end of every round, recycle() recycles all the offers remained on the table and adds them into the stack.

    • accept

      public void accept​(Visitor visitor)
      Design pattern Visitor. To accept the visit of Visitor.
      指定者:
      accept 在接口中 Accepter
      参数:
      visitor - the Visitor which is accepted.

    • matchchar

      public Player matchchar​(java.lang.String charateristics)
      At the end of the game, compare everyone's Jests to discover whose Jest meets the condition in the orange band of each trophy.
      参数:
      charateristics - is the description of the condition in the orange band of each trophy.
      返回:
      type of Player who is the player whose Jest meets the condition in the orange band of the trophy with corresponding characteristics.

    • assignTrophy

      public void assignTrophy()
      For each card in the Trophy, find out the player who will gain it with the function matchchar(String charateristics).

    • decidewinner

      public Player decidewinner​(java.util.LinkedList<Player> playerlisttocal)
      To decide the winner.
      参数:
      playerlisttocal - is the list of all the players whose Jests will be compared.
      返回:
      type of Player is the winner of the game.

    • createVirtualPlayers

      public void createVirtualPlayers​(int i, int m)
      createVirtualPlayers(int i,int m) creates corresponding number of virtual players.
      参数:
      i - is the number of human players.
      m - is the number of virtual players.

    • createvirtualplayer

      public void createvirtualplayer​(int m, Level level)
      createvirtualplayer(int m,Level level) creates a virtual player.
      参数:
      m - is the serial number of this virtual player.
      level - is the level of this virtual player (easy,normal,tough).

    • createhumanplayer

      public void createhumanplayer​(java.lang.String name)
      createhumanplayer(String name) creates a human player and adds it to the list of human players
      参数:
      name - is the name of the human player.

    • showPlayers

      public void showPlayers()
      showPlayers() shows all the players (human players and virtual players)

    • makeOffer

      public void makeOffer​(int i)
      For all the human players, shows their Jests and two cards dealt to them, and then the human player choose one to face up. For all the virtual players, call the function StrategyOffer().
      参数:
      i -

    • showFacedUpOffers

      public void showFacedUpOffers()
      Each round after all the players have maken their offers, showFacedUpOffers() shows all the face-up offers of each players

    • takeOffers

      public void takeOffers​(Player playerdecided)
      takeOffers(Player playerdecided) allows the player to take a card from other peoples' offers.
      参数:
      playerdecided - is the player who is going to take the offer. if playerdecided is a virtual player, call the function StrategyTake.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main function. Inside the main function, we first get the unique instance of the game table. Inside the function overwrote run(), the user can decide the number of human players. Then corresponding numbers of the virtual players will be created. After the player list, human player list and the virtual player list are created and elements are added, it will show all the players. Then the game table will be set up and the game starts. If there are still cards in the draw deck, cards are dealt and each player makes offer and takes offer. If there are no card in the draw deck, each player takes the remained offer in front of them. Then the winner will be decided and the game is over.

    • run

      public void run()
      指定者:
      run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

    • getThread

      public java.lang.Thread getThread()
